name: SMS Query Responder
tagline: A Software To Receive SMS Message On Computer With Modem
body:
### SMS QUERY RESPONDER SMS Query Responder is a program that lets you automatically receive and reply to SMS messages on a PC and website by using a 3G/GSM modem or phone attached to a computer. ### SERVICES OF SMS QUERY RESPONDER * Forward incoming SMS messages to a Website via HTTP, so they can be processed by a server-side script. * Store incoming SMS messages in a database. * Forward incoming SMS messages to one or more Email addresses. * Forward received SMS messages to another phone(s). * Auto reply to incoming SMS messages with a predefined template, or a dynamically. * Supports automatic SMS message reply to the sender. The reply message text can be predefined in the settings, or generated dynamically by a web script. * Support automatic forwarding of received SMS messages to other phone numbers with optional filtering by the original SMS message sender's number and contents. * Supports automatic forwarding of received SMS text messages as email messages to one or more addresses using the SMTP protocol. Messages can be forwarded to different email addresses depending on the content of the message and/or the sender's number generated message. ### SMS to Web Server SMS Query Responder allows you to programmatically receive and reply to incoming SMS messages on your website using any web language, such as JSP,PHP, ASP.NET and so forth. ### How it Works SMS Query Responder software connects to a GSM or 3G modem plugged in a computer. Each time a new SMS message arrives to that modem, the software forwards that message to your web server via HTTP, so that the message can be handled by your script or web application. ### Authors and Contributors This project was developed for NIC Lucknow under guidence of Mr. Alok Tiwari (Technical Director at NIC Lucknow) and Mr. Ashish Kumar(Assistant Professor, CSE at PSITcoe Kanpur).
